byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and FAHIM ABED

headline.print_headline: ISIS Again Strikes at Afghan Shiites
headline.main: Islamic State Again Strikes at Afghan Shiites, Killing at Least 30 in Kabul

snippet: A suicide bombing in Kabul targeted worshipers who were honoring the Islamic ceremony of Arbaeen, and came after another recent assault on a Shiite shrine....
lead_paragraph: A suicide bombing in Kabul targeted worshipers who were honoring the Islamic ceremony of Arbaeen, and came after another recent assault on a Shiite shrine.
